name: error_description
description
description
error_description
Send Money
info:
Request body must contains 

    - senderPhone,
    - receiverPhone
    - currency
    - amount
 
Also you must add in enviroment params information about 

    - card acceptor 
    - acquiring 
    - trace audit number
    - business app id
    - retrieval reference number

name: set req body
set req body

set req body
get envs
func:
msg.baseUrl = env.get("VISA_API_URL")
msg.authorization = env.get("AUTH_TOKEN")
msg.sharedSecret = env.get("SHARED_SECRET")
msg.apiKey = env.get("API_KEY")
msg.host = env.get("HOST")

msg.cardAcceptor = JSON.parse(env.get("CARD_ACCEPTOR"))
msg.acqInfo = JSON.parse(env.get("ACQUIRING_INFO"))

msg.retNumber = env.get("RET_NUMBER")
msg.traceAuditNumber = env.get("TRACE_AUDIT_NUMBER")
msg.businessApplicationId = env.get("BUSINESS_APP_ID")

return msg;
